posts.post_content:
For sale are these 2 T202's...

#9 Birmingham Gets to Third w/Johnson & Street.... $SOLD, SGC 1, great color and focus, appears VG-EX, downgraded due to tiny pinhole on top boarder and small piece missing out of right edge (tough to see in scans).

#46 Devlin Gets His Man w/Mathewson & Fletcher....$SOLD, SGC A, great color and focus, light vertical crease through center, appears Good+, card came out of 100 year old estate with 20+ other t202's several years ago, unsure of the 'A' grade. 

Prices include shipping. Payment via Paypal 'Gift' or price plus 3% for regular Paypal ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
